tags: sorry this is a bit depressing
but they better give us SO MANY IG updates after the Eid Clip or I'm rioting
summary: Honestly, it kinda makes sense if the last episode is on the day of Eid, because OG was just a full week of different POV.  The...
body:
Honestly, it kinda makes sense if the last episode is on the day of Eid, because OG was just a full week of different POV. 

The Skam France team already said that they didn’t do this for episode 10 and really, the only clip that would make the cut was the Eid clip. SO, maybe they did some clips without fully switching POV but focusing on different storylines during the Eid clips? 

Maybe we’ll get a clip with Imane and Sofiane talking about their relationship, maybe we’ll see  Idriss and Eliott talking about their relationship, then the girls apologising to Imane, Emma not going back with Yann and being happy as a single woman (please Skam France, putting Manon and Charles together is already a big NO, don’t add this to the ‘terrible idea’ list), maybe we’ll get a cute Elu moment, maybe a cute Daphné/Basile moment too. 6 clips can show us a lot really.

I’m just rambling but the show ending is making me sad and if the last day we’re seeing these characters is on Tuesday/Wednesday, it’s going to be even harder to say goodbye.

Maybe we’ll get a clip with Imane and Sofiane talking about their relationship, maybe we’ll see  Idriss and Eliott talking about their relationship, then the girls apologising to Imane, Emma not going back with Yann and being happy as a single woman (please Skam France, putting Manon and Charles together is already a big NO, don’t add this to the ‘terrible idea’ list), maybe we’ll get a cute Elu moment, maybe a cute Daphné/Basile moment too. 6 clips can show us a lot really.

tags: me to me: you should go to bed
also me: i am loving all these asks sjfhsjfhsj
summary: Oh this gives me life ❤️ so what Lulu does with his tumblr? maybe he appears here very rare? Or he only returns here to watch...
question: Oh this gives me life ❤️ so what Lulu does with his tumblr? maybe he appears here very rare? Or he only returns here to watch what Eliott posted?
answer: I think he doesn’t spend a lot of time on tumblr, he comes by every once in a while or whenever Eliott tells him he posted something new on it, because he makes it a sport to be the first person to like and reblog his boyfriend’s art with the most obnoxiously sweet tags. He doesn’t quite understand how tags work so it’s a right mess. He mostly follows funny accounts and reblogs memes and chainposts that makes him laugh. Every once in a while he reblogs a raccoon or a hedgehog and tags Eliott in it, with a funny or sweet inside joke.

blog.description: Hi, I'm Tara. I live in the Netherlands. 30 years old. Decided to delurk now that my skam obsession had returned with a vengeance.

summary: But can you imagine Eliott's blog here on tumblr? what is it? Some hipster shit and goth aesthetic and pride posts or??? I need...
question: But can you imagine Eliott's blog here on tumblr? what is it? Some hipster shit and goth aesthetic and pride posts or??? I need list of topics lmao and also what fandoms does he follow???
answer: He uses his own art as his header and icon, love that for him. He has a link at the top of his description that says that he has a boyfriend and to go check out his account (because after Eliott creates a Tumblr, Lucas can’t stay behind, of course). He follows all sorts of art blogs and every once in a while he posts his own art, and he reblogs short stories about romance. He also follows and reblogs a lot of blogs and posts that give out positive vibes and mi/mental health advice. At the moment his blog is full of pride posts, naturally.

summary: Tara!! Do you think we can still get the 'birthday' video? I know we got a 20 sec video like a month ago, but that was too short...
question: Tara!! Do you think we can still get the 'birthday' video? I know we got a 20 sec video like a month ago, but that was too short and felt incomplete... 🤡🤡
answer: I do think we can still get it because the video that was posted was not mentioned on the show, so it doesn’t count as canon. Therefore, Eliott will mention the birthday video in the last episode, and they will release it after that so that people who normally don’t follow social media can look it up. In this essay I will - 🤡🤡🤡
